channel.title: Workshop on Arbor Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in Workshop on Arbor Analytics

item.title: Data Science for Forestry Applications
item.description: This hands-on workshop will showcase how data science can be used in forestry applications. Learn how to use open-source software (specifically R) to work quickly and efficiently with forestry data, with a focus on using large datasets such as Forest Inventory and Analysis data. This workshop is perfect for students and professionals who want to learn more about how to use R to work with the data they have.
